WorkItem.Description:
Currently, PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 assumes that all color indexes point to the default color table. This gives incorrect color reading for fonts, borders, and fills when there is a PALETTE record present (overrides the default colors). That is the case whenever the xls file contains user-defined colors.
Â 
Also, there are 8 built-in EGA colors in Excel formats. These are currently not read and they result in black color.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5 support for user-defined colors and special built-in colors
